channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
This is when i load it up thats what it comes up with ..
Loaded all chars. (NPCChars, TradeChars, SmallChars, StatChars, UpChars) 11/02/2009: SCAR Divi 3.20 RC3 is now available in the R&D section of the forums. (note that you need to register to view and download) (Forums: http://freddy1990.com/forums) (Wiki: http://freddy1990.com/wiki) (IRC: irc.moparisthebest.com #freddy1990) (Donate: http://freddy1990.com/donate.php)
When i try and run this script on this forum .. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,59704.0.html This is what it comes up with any suggestion post please.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.15\includes\Si.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling
It comes up with this every time i try and run a script HELP!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

That script is outadted, Si.scar used to be used in scripts but now SRL is the only include that works, head over to http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/ to get it and more recent scripts

Read full topic
